title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 358.3 - No reduction on account of service retirement benefits received
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 358.3 - No reduction on account of service retirement benefits received

State Regulations

The amount of disability retirement benefits payable to an
individual who was restored to membership following service retirement shall
not be reduced in connection with the amount of service retirement benefits
paid prior to restoration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
358.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
